overview: Released initially as Brother Trouble and Brother Trouble II, The movies have now been re-edited by director Josh Eliot into one exclusive feature. We follow brothers Karl and Greg Thomas as they inherit their uncle's haunted house as well as his taste for cock. Derrick Jenson and Alan Lambert join the mix.
tagline: What happens when two hot and horny brothers inherit their uncle's house and a trust of lust?
title: Brother Trouble
